properties.name: TopicsToReplicate
properties.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics to copy.

type.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics to copy.

properties.name: TopicsToExclude
properties.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics that should not be replicated.

type.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the topics that should not be replicated.

properties.name: CopyTopicConfigurations
properties.description: Whether to periodically configure remote topics to match their corresponding upstream topics.

type.description: Whether to periodically configure remote topics to match their corresponding upstream topics.

properties.name: CopyAccessControlListsForTopics
properties.description: Whether to periodically configure remote topic ACLs to match their corresponding upstream topics.

type.description: Whether to periodically configure remote topic ACLs to match their corresponding upstream topics.

properties.name: DetectAndCopyNewTopics
properties.description: Whether to periodically check for new topics and partitions.

type.description: Whether to periodically check for new topics and partitions.

ConsumerGroupReplication.description: Configuration relating to consumer group replication.

properties.name: ConsumerGroupsToReplicate
properties.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups to copy.

type.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups to copy.

properties.name: ConsumerGroupsToExclude
properties.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups that should not be replicated.

type.description: List of regular expression patterns indicating the consumer groups that should not be replicated.

properties.name: SynchroniseConsumerGroupOffsets
properties.description: Whether to periodically write the translated offsets to __consumer_offsets topic in target cluster.

type.description: Whether to periodically write the translated offsets to __consumer_offsets topic in target cluster.

properties.name: DetectAndCopyNewConsumerGroups
properties.description: Whether to periodically check for new consumer groups.

type.description: Whether to periodically check for new consumer groups.

ReplicationInfo.description: Specifies configuration for replication between a source and target Kafka cluster.

properties.name: SourceKafkaClusterArn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name of the source Kafka cluster.

type.description: Amazon Resource Name of the source Kafka cluster.

properties.name: TargetKafkaClusterArn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name of the target Kafka cluster.

type.description: Amazon Resource Name of the target Kafka cluster.

properties.name: TargetCompressionType
properties.description: The type of compression to use writing records to target Kafka cluster.

type.description: The type of compression to use writing records to target Kafka cluster.

properties.name: TopicReplication
properties.description: Configuration relating to topic replication.

type.description: Configuration relating to topic replication.

properties.name: ConsumerGroupReplication
properties.description: Configuration relating to consumer group replication.

type.description: Configuration relating to consumer group replication.

AmazonMskCluster.description: Details of an Amazon MSK cluster.

properties.name: MskClusterArn
properties.description: The ARN of an Amazon MSK cluster.

type.description: The ARN of an Amazon MSK cluster.

KafkaClusterClientVpcConfig.description: Details of an Amazon VPC which has network connectivity to the Kafka cluster.

properties.name: SecurityGroupIds
properties.description: The AWS security groups to associate with the elastic network interfaces in order to specify what the replicator has access to. If a security group is not specified, the default security group associated with the VPC is used.

type.description: The AWS security groups to associate with the elastic network interfaces in order to specify what the replicator has access to. If a security group is not specified, the default security group associated with the VPC is used.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.description: The list of subnets to connect to in the virtual private cloud (VPC). AWS creates elastic network interfaces inside these subnets.

type.description: The list of subnets to connect to in the virtual private cloud (VPC). AWS creates elastic network interfaces inside these subnets.

KafkaCluster.description: Details of a Kafka cluster for replication.

properties.name: AmazonMskCluster
properties.description: Details of an Amazon MSK cluster. Exactly one of AmazonMskCluster is required.

type.description: Details of an Amazon MSK cluster. Exactly one of AmazonMskCluster is required.

properties.name: VpcConfig
properties.description: Details of an Amazon VPC which has network connectivity to the Apache Kafka cluster.

type.description: Details of an Amazon VPC which has network connectivity to the Apache Kafka cluster.

properties.name: ReplicatorName
properties.description: The name of the replicator.

type.description: The name of the replicator.

properties.name: CurrentVersion
properties.description: The current version of the MSK replicator.

type.description: The current version of the MSK replicator.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A summary description of the replicator.

type.description: A summary description of the replicator.

properties.name: KafkaClusters
properties.description: Specifies a list of Kafka clusters which are targets of the replicator.

type.description: Specifies a list of Kafka clusters which are targets of the replicator.

properties.name: ReplicationInfoList
properties.description: A list of replication configurations, where each configuration targets a given source cluster to target cluster replication flow.

type.description: A list of replication configurations, where each configuration targets a given source cluster to target cluster replication flow.

properties.name: ServiceExecutionRoleArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role used by the replicator to access external resources.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role used by the replicator to access external resources.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource

type.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource

properties.name: ReplicatorArn
properties.description: Amazon Resource Name for the created replicator.

type.description: Amazon Resource Name for the created replicator.
